full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'PHRIN LAS KUN BSGRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (ZHES BRTAN BSRUNG BKA'I BSRUNG DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'PHRIN LAS KUN BSGRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA LDAN PA SMAN RAM PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB KYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS SKU SKYES SU MA TI AARTHA SIDHI MING CAN GYIS DAM PA'I GSUNG LTAR YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO SPOBS PA'I SHES RAB DANG LDAN PA THO YON BLO BZANG SHES RAB KYIS BRIS PA'O, , 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YIN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
